In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
That which has reached my lord Abû Muḥammad ʿAbdallâh
from Abû Sâlima - may God exalt him - out of my (own) hand
of gold coins
(amounts to) seven dînârs out of my (own) hand. Thereof (is)〚... ... ...〛the Muʿizzî (?)
and one dînâr from the money of the (great) mosque ... ... ... ...
